summary: This document is an internal email chain from July 27, 2019, regarding the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It details a staff member's assessment of Epstein's condition, noting he seemed stable but complained of dehydration, anxiety, and sleep issues due to noise in the SHU.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate being discussed in the email chain regarding his suicide watch status, psychological observation, and complaints about conditions.

events.title: Epstein's Status Assessment
events.description: A staff member assesses inmate Jeffrey Epstein, finding him stable but reporting complaints of dehydration due to limited bathroom breaks during long legal visits, anxiety about returning to the SHU, and inability to sleep due to noise.

keyFacts: On July 27, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch and psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Epstein complained of dehydration because he could not drink enough water during his approximately 12-hour legal visits due to limited bathroom breaks.
Epstein expressed anxiety about returning to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and an inability to sleep there due to noise from banging and screaming at night.
A staff member assessed Epstein as 'stable' on the morning of July 27, 2019, before his legal visit.
